Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ra.raadmin

Interface EndEntityProfileSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EndEntityProfileSessionLocal, EndEntityProfileSessionRemote
    public interface EndEntityProfileSession
    Session bean for managing End Entity Profiles.
    Version:
    $Id: EndEntityProfileSession.java 29589 2018-08-08 12:02:53Z bastianf $

    • Method Detail

      • addEndEntityProfile

        int addEndEntityProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                        String profilename,
                        EndEntityProfile profile)
                 throws EndEntityProfileExistsException,
                        AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds a profile to the database. Will automatically set a valid ID.
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing task
        profilename - readable profile name
        profile - profile to be added
        Returns:
        the ID of the end entity profile added.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if admin was not authorized to add end entity profiles
        EndEntityProfileExistsException - if a profile of the given name already exists

      • addEndEntityProfile

        void addEndEntityProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                         int profileid,
                         String profilename,
                         EndEntityProfile profile)
                  throws EndEntityProfileExistsException,
                         AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds a profile to the database.
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing task
        profileid - internal ID of new profile, use only if you know it's right.
        profilename - readable profile name
        profile - profile to be added
        Throws:
        EndEntityProfileExistsException - fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • cloneEndEntityProfile

        void cloneEndEntityProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                           String originalprofilename,
                           String newprofilename)
                    throws EndEntityProfileExistsException,
                           AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds a end entity profile to a group with the same content as the original profile.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        originalprofilename - name
        newprofilename - name
        Throws:
        EndEntityProfileExistsException - fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • findFreeEndEntityProfileId

        int findFreeEndEntityProfileId()
        Returns:
        an unused end id number.

      • removeEndEntityProfile

        void removeEndEntityProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                            String profilename)
                     throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Removes an end entity profile from the database, does not throw any errors if the profile does not exist.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        profilename - name
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • renameEndEntityProfile

        void renameEndEntityProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                            String oldprofilename,
                            String newprofilename)
                     throws EndEntityProfileExistsException,
                            AuthorizationDeniedException
        Renames a end entity profile.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        oldprofilename - name
        newprofilename - name
        Throws:
        EndEntityProfileExistsException - fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • changeEndEntityProfile

        void changeEndEntityProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                            String profilename,
                            EndEntityProfile profile)
                     throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                            EndEntityProfileNotFoundException
        Updates profile data.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        profilename - name
        profile - profile
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
        EndEntityProfileNotFoundException - if sought end entity profile was not found.

      • internalChangeEndEntityProfileNoFlushCache

        void internalChangeEndEntityProfileNoFlushCache​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                String profilename,
                                                EndEntityProfile profile)
                                         throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                                EndEntityProfileNotFoundException
        Do NOT use, use changeEndEntityProfile instead. Used internally for testing only. Updates a profile without flushing caches. TODO: Move this method out of production code.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        profilename - profila
        profile - profile
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
        EndEntityProfileNotFoundException - if sought end entity profile was not found.

      • getAuthorizedEndEntityProfileIds

        Collection<Integer> getAuthorizedEndEntityProfileIds​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                     String endentityAccessRule)
        Retrieves a Collection of id:s (Integer) to authorized profiles.
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator for whom to get the profile Ids he/she has access to
        endentityAccessRule - an access rule which is required on the profile in order for it to be returned, for example AccessRulesConstants.CREATE_END_ENTITY to only return profiles for which the admin have create rights
        Returns:
        Collection of end entity profile id:s (Integer)

      • getAuthorizedEndEntityProfileIdsWithMissingCAs

        List<Integer> getAuthorizedEndEntityProfileIdsWithMissingCAs​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        Retrives a list of ids to profiles with non-existent CA ids, if the admin has root rule access. Otherwise an empty list is returned.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        Returns:
        list

      • getEndEntityProfileIdToNameMap

        Map<Integer,​String> getEndEntityProfileIdToNameMap()
        Returns:
        mapping of profile id (Integer) to profile name (String).

      • flushProfileCache

        void flushProfileCache()
        Clear and reload end entity profile caches.

      • getEndEntityProfile

        EndEntityProfile getEndEntityProfile​(int id)
        Finds a end entity profile by id.
        Parameters:
        id - ID
        Returns:
        EndEntityProfile (cloned) or null if it does not exist

      • getEndEntityProfile

        EndEntityProfile getEndEntityProfile​(String profilename)
        Get a copy of an EndEntityProfile.
        Parameters:
        profilename - profile
        Returns:
        EndEntityProfile (cloned) or null if it does not exist

      • getEndEntityProfileId

        int getEndEntityProfileId​(String profilename)
                   throws EndEntityProfileNotFoundException
        Returns a end entity profile's ID, given its name
        Parameters:
        profilename - profile
        Returns:
        the id
        Throws:
        EndEntityProfileNotFoundException - if profile wasn't found

      • getEndEntityProfileName

        String getEndEntityProfileName​(int id)
        Returns a end entity profiles name given it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - ID
        Returns:
        profile's name or null if profile id does not exist.

      • getEndEntityProfilesUsingCertificateProfile

        List<String> getEndEntityProfilesUsingCertificateProfile​(int certificateprofileid)
        Method to check if a CertificateProfile exists in any of the end entity profiles. Used to avoid desynchronization of certificate profile data.
        Parameters:
        certificateprofileid - the CertificateProfile's id to search for.
        Returns:
        a collection of EndEntityProfile names using the sought CertificateProfile

      • getAvailableCertificateProfiles

        Map<String,​Integer> getAvailableCertificateProfiles​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                          int entityProfileId)
                                                   throws EndEntityProfileNotFoundException
        Fetches available certificate profiles associated with an end entity profile. No authorization required.
        Parameters:
        admin - the authentication of the caller.
        entityProfileId - id of the end entity profile.
        Returns:
        a map of available certificate profiles names and IDs or an empty map.
        Throws:
        EndEntityProfileNotFoundException - if a profile with the ID entityProfileId could not be found

      • getAvailableCasInProfile

        Map<String,​Integer> getAvailableCasInProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                   int entityProfileId)
                                            throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                                   EndEntityProfileNotFoundException
        Fetches the available CAs associated with an end entity profile. Authorization requirements:
         - /administrator
 - /endentityprofilesrules/<end entity profile>
        Parameters:
        admin - the authentication of the caller.
        entityProfileId - id of the end entity profile.
        Returns:
        a map of available CA names and IDs or an empty map.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the authorization was denied (still not thrown).
        EndEntityProfileNotFoundException - if the end entity could not be found.

      • existsCAInEndEntityProfiles

        boolean existsCAInEndEntityProfiles​(int caid)
        Method to check if a CA exists in any of the end entity profiles. Used to avoid desynchronization of CA data.
        Parameters:
        caid - the caid to search for.
        Returns:
        true if CA exists in any of the end entity profiles.

      • getProfileAsXml

        byte[] getProfileAsXml​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                       int profileId)
                throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                       EndEntityProfileNotFoundException
        Fetches the profile specified by profileId and profileType in XML format. Authorization requirements:
         - /administrator
 - /endentityprofilesrules/<end entity profile>
 - /ca/<ca name>
        For detailed documentation for how to parse an End Entity Profile XML, see the org.ejbca.core.model.ra.raadmin.EndEntity class.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        profileId - ID of the profile we want to retrieve.
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the specified profile in XML format.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the requesting admin wasn't authorized to the profile or any of the CA's therein
        EndEntityProfileNotFoundException - if the profile was not found
